summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Mercer Corridor; modifying restrictions in the 2004 Adopted Budget that limit the Seattle Department of Transportation's spending on the Mercer Corridor Project; recommending the Two-Way Mercer Boulevard and narrowed Valley Street alternative for evaluation in the NEPA and SEPA environmental review process; directing the Department of Transportation to develop options for the proposed Two-way Mercer alternative to meet certain performance improvements; and directing the Department to evaluate other measures that may help traffic flow, including an aggressive Transportation Demand Management Program for South Lake Union.
